nodes.text: Cathington's Disorder was a rare neurological disease that was seen in the galaxy in the years before the planet Taris's destruction in 3956 BBY. Dynamet General, Taris's foremost research hospital, developed a cure for the disorder in the century before Taris's destruction.
Cathington's Disorder was first mentioned in the Codex entry for Dynamet General in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
